controls.caption: Requires input
controls.name: requireInput
controls.description: If set, the input port must contain some initialized matrix; in another case, this function will throw an exception. If this flag is cleared, empty input port doesn't lead to any effect: output port will still stay empty.

controls.caption: Fill alpha
controls.name: fillAlphaWithMaxValue
controls.description:
If set and new number of channels > 3, then the 4th resulting channel (alpha) and all subsequent "extra" channels (if any) will be filled with the maximal possible value. For the alpha-channel, this means "full opacity".
If not set, all "extra" channels added to the result will be copies of the first source channel.
